title: Lady and the Tramp
description: What do you get when you combine a dog from the wrong side of the tracks with a pampered pooch?One of the most beloved animated films of all time, of course!Walt Disney's Lady and the Tramp is a timeless classic, cherished by children and adults alike. Now experience the movie again before bedtime with this full-color Little Golden Book retelling of this delightful doggie tale.
author: Teddy Slater
